DOC.brief_summary: Phase I , Randomized , Parallel-group , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Single Dose Study Evaluate Blockade CGRP Receptor AMG 334 Preventing PACAP-38 Induced Migraine-like Attacks Migraine Patients .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Blockade CGRP Preventing PACAP-38 Induced Migraine-like Attacks With AMG 334 Migraine Patients
DOC.criteria: Adults ≥ 18 ≤ 45 year age upon entry screen History migraine headache without aura ≥ 6 month prior screen accord IHS Classification ICHDII ( Headache Classification Committee International Headache Society , 2004 ) base medical record and/or patient selfreport Migraine frequency : ≥ 1 ≤ 5 migraine day per month 3 month prior screen History migraine aura , cluster headache hemiplegic migraine headache accord IHS Classification ICHDII ( Headache Classification Committee International Headache Society , 2004 ) base medical record and/or patient selfreport ≥ 6 migraine day per month last 3 month prior study enrollment screening period Other headache disorder ( except episodic tensiontype headache < 5 days/month )
